subject: Fw: Costs
description_text:
Ok you do not wish
To do business!!
Another missed sale because your customer service is bad!!
Will add you to my  Youtube review channel I run as poor communicators and service

________________________________
From: Gazzo Yep <gazzo6512@googlemail.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 25, 2025 00:55
To: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Subject: Costs

Hi
Your website currently shows

Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals with Baseplate and Carbon Fiber Heel Plate
Â£288.00Save 10%

I am in the UK

If I pay the Express Shipping cost  additionally

Is that the only cost to me?
No import taxes

Regards Gary

conversations.body_text: Hi Gazzo Yep,    Hello, due to the Black Friday period over the past few days, our sales and customer service teams have been very busy, so our email response time has been slower than usual. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We currently have stock in our German warehouse, but it is responsible for EU shipments. For orders shipped to the UK, we may need to dispatch the package directly from our China warehouse, which could result in customs duties. Thank you for your understanding.

Why cant you send from Germany??
________________________________

Hi Gazzo Yep,    The operations team just replied that inventory in Germany is expected to be restocked in a few days. However, shipping from Germany to the UK will incur customs duties. Meanwhile, shipping from China to the UK is also quite fast.
